name: Adrift Shirt Purple
description: The Adrift mock neck sweater takes the idea of fashion as entertainment to the next level. This comfortable fiber blend material features a special vid-fabric depicting a dynamic space scene to ensure that people won't be able to keep their eyes off you.
description_cn: 这款逐流带领毛织衬衫将艺术和时尚的结合提升到了一个新的档次.这种舒适的混合纤维材料中加入了一种能够显示动态星空景象的特殊动态纤维材质，让你无论在哪里都能吸引人们绝对的注意力.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Aparelli_NewBabbage
